name: Cauliflower With Parsley Butter Sauce
keywords: butter, cauliflower, parsley, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Break the cauliflower into large flowerets. Put them in a kettle and add cold water with salt. Add the milk and simmer for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender. Do not overcook. Drain well.
Melt the butter in a skillet. Add the lemon juice and the flowerets. Add chopped parsley and salt and pepper. Cook for 1 minute. Serve immediately.
